message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid further complications.
I'm happy to split it evenly.  Let's get this over with!
Bob, time is money! My offer is still on the table. Let's wrap this up.
Since you rejected an even split, I'm going to take a little more this time. I'm still open to negotiation, but time is ticking!
Okay, Bob, let's compromise. This is a serious offer. Take it before inflation eats away at the pot!
I'm getting impatient. I'm upping my offer, but if you keep rejecting, I'm going to take it all!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option. I suggest you take it before we both lose out!
